problem_text_cn: 如图,⊙O的半径为1,PA切⊙O于点A,连接OA,OP交⊙O于点D,且∠APO=30°,弦AB⊥OP于点C,则图中阴影部分面积等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is N_0, PA cuts ⊙O at point A, connects OA, OP intersects ⊙O at point D, and ∠APO = N_1, chord AB ⊥ OP at point C, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PA是半径为1的⊙O的切线,∴OA⊥PA,而∠APO=30°,∠POA=90°-30°=60°,又∵OP垂直平分AB,∴△AOC≌△BOC,∴S_{△AOC}=S_{△BOC},∴S_{阴影部分}=S_{扇形OAD}=\frac{60π×1^{2}}{360}=\frac{π}{6}．故选:A．
